t = input()
for i in range(t):
    n = input()
    r = raw_input().split()
    num = ""
    l = []
    x,y,z = r[0],r[1],r[2]
    for a in range(10):
        for b in range(10):
            a,b = str(a),str(b)
            num = a+x+y+z+b
            num = int(num)
            if num%n==0:
                l.append(num)
    l=sorted(l, reverse=True)
    if len(l)!=0:
        num = l[0]
        num=str(num)
        print num[0], num[-1], int(num)/n
    else:
        print 0
